name: rsp-cpms-orchestration
description: Service to orchestrate payment information with CPMS

scripts.start: rm -rf build && npm run copy-localfiles && npm run parallel
scripts.copy-localfiles: npm run copy-sls && npm run copy-mockdata && npm run copy-models && npm run copy-openapi && npm run copy-dotenv
scripts.prepush: npm test && npm run lint && npm run check-security && npm run check-security-log
scripts.deploy-AWS: npm run copy-package && npm run copy-sls && cd ./build && npm install --production && sls deploy
scripts.build-openapi: npm run compile && npm run copy-localfiles && cd build && sls openapi generate -f json && npm run openapireplace
scripts.build-artifact: cd build && rm -rf artifacts && pwd && sls package --package artifacts
scripts.post-build-cleanup: rm -rf build/mock-data && rm -f build/package.json && rm -f build/openApiReplace.js && rm -f build/package-lock.json
scripts.start-build: rm -rf build && npm run copy-localfiles && npm run compile && npm run copy-package && npm run build-node-modules && npm run post-build-cleanup && npm run build-artifact && rm -f build/serverless.yml
scripts.build-and-deploy-AWS: npm run start-build && npm run deploy-AWS
